results.title: The impact of metformin use on the risk of prostate cancer after prostate biopsy in patients with high grade intraepithelial neoplasia
results.text_hl: Our data showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users with a negative re-biopsy after @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Intraepithelial_Neoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019048 @@@HGPIN@@@ diagnosis were proportionately higher than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ non-users (p<0.001).

citations.NLM: Dell'Atti L, Galosi AB. The impact of metformin use on the risk of prostate cancer after prostate biopsy in patients with high grade intraepithelial neoplasia Int Braz J Urol. 2018 Jan-Feb;44(1):69-74. PMID: 29211393
citations.BibTeX: @article{29211393, title={The impact of metformin use on the risk of prostate cancer after prostate biopsy in patients with high grade intraepithelial neoplasia}, author={Dell'Atti L and Galosi AB}, journal={Int Braz J Urol}, volume={44}, number={1}, pages={69-74}}

results.title: Metformin targets c-MYC oncogene to prevent prostate cancer.
results.text_hl: Our novel findings suggest that by downregulating c-myc, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can act as a chemopreventive agent to restrict @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Intraepithelial_Neoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019048 @@@prostatic neoplasia@@@ initiation and transformation.

citations.NLM: Akinyeke T, Matsumura S, Wang X, Wu Y, Schalfer ED, Saxena A, Yan W, Logan SK, Li X. Metformin targets c-MYC oncogene to prevent prostate cancer. Carcinogenesis. 2013 Dec;34(12):2823-32. PMID: 24130167
citations.BibTeX: @article{24130167, title={Metformin targets c-MYC oncogene to prevent prostate cancer.}, author={Akinyeke T and Matsumura S and Wang X and Wu Y and Schalfer ED and Saxena A and Yan W and Logan SK and Li X}, journal={Carcinogenesis}, volume={34}, number={12}, pages={2823-32}}

results.title: The effects of adiponectin and metformin on prostate and colon neoplasia involve activation of AMP-activated protein kinase.
results.text_hl: The effects of @GENE_ADIPOQ @GENE_9370 @@@adiponectin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Intraepithelial_Neoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019048 @@@prostate and colon neoplasia@@@ involve activation of @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMP-activated protein kinase@@@.

citations.NLM: Zakikhani M, Dowling RJ, Sonenberg N, Pollak MN. The effects of adiponectin and metformin on prostate and colon neoplasia involve activation of AMP-activated protein kinase. Cancer Prev Res (Phila). 2008 Oct;1(5):369-75. PMID: 19138981
citations.BibTeX: @article{19138981, title={The effects of adiponectin and metformin on prostate and colon neoplasia involve activation of AMP-activated protein kinase.}, author={Zakikhani M and Dowling RJ and Sonenberg N and Pollak MN}, journal={Cancer Prev Res (Phila)}, volume={1}, number={5}, pages={369-75}}

results.title: Effect of Metformin, Rapamycin, and Their Combination on Growth and Progression of Prostate Tumors in HiMyc Mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ (250 mg/kg body weight in the drinking water), @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@RAPA@@@ (2.24 mg/kg body weight microencapsulated in the diet), and the combination inhibited progression of @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Intraepithelial_Neoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019048 @@@prostatic intraepithelial neoplasia lesions@@@ to @DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000230 @@@adenocarcinomas@@@ in @DISEASE_Prostatitis @DISEASE_MESH:D011472 @@@the ventral prostate@@@ (@DISEASE_Prostatitis @DISEASE_MESH:D011472 @@@VP@@@).

citations.NLM: Saha A, Blando J, Tremmel L, DiGiovanni J. Effect of Metformin, Rapamycin, and Their Combination on Growth and Progression of Prostate Tumors in HiMyc Mice. Cancer Prev Res (Phila). 2015 Jul;8(7):597-606. PMID: 25908508
citations.BibTeX: @article{25908508, title={Effect of Metformin, Rapamycin, and Their Combination on Growth and Progression of Prostate Tumors in HiMyc Mice.}, author={Saha A and Blando J and Tremmel L and DiGiovanni J}, journal={Cancer Prev Res (Phila)}, volume={8}, number={7}, pages={597-606}}

results.title: Metformin Inhibits Prostate Cancer Progression by Targeting Tumor-Associated Inflammatory Infiltration.
results.text_hl: We are interested in understanding the inhibitory mechanism of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@-associated @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ in @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@.Experimental Design: By using a transgenic @DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000230 @@@adenocarcinoma of the mouse prostate@@@ (TRAMP) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model, in vitro macrophage migration assays, and @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ samples, we examined the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@-associated @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ during the initiation and after androgen deprivation therapy of @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@.Results: Treating TRAMP @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ delays @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@ progression from low-grade @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Intraepithelial_Neoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019048 @@@prostatic intraepithelial neoplasia@@@ to high-grade PIN, undifferentiated to well-differentiated, and PIN to @DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000230 @@@adenocarcinoma@@@ with concurrent inhibition of @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ infiltration evidenced by reduced recruitment of @DISEASE_Macrophage_Activation_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D055501 @@@macrophages@@@.

citations.NLM: Liu Q, Tong D, Liu G, Gao J, Wang LA, Xu J, Yang X, Xie Q, Huang Y, Pang J, Wang L, He Y, Zhang D, Ma Q, Lan W, Jiang J. Metformin Inhibits Prostate Cancer Progression by Targeting Tumor-Associated Inflammatory Infiltration. Clin Cancer Res. 2018 Nov 15;24(22):5622-5634. PMID: 30012567
citations.BibTeX: @article{30012567, title={Metformin Inhibits Prostate Cancer Progression by Targeting Tumor-Associated Inflammatory Infiltration.}, author={Liu Q and Tong D and Liu G and Gao J and Wang LA and Xu J and Yang X and Xie Q and Huang Y and Pang J and Wang L and He Y and Zhang D and Ma Q and Lan W and Jiang J}, journal={Clin Cancer Res}, volume={24}, number={22}, pages={5622-5634}}
